node.name: Wireless Booster MAKE: TP-LINK MODEL: TL-WA850RE
node.description: 2 internal antennas with adjustable range extender to limit the secondary WiFi distribution area. Include one ethernet port to function as a wireless adapter. Signal indicator and with wireless standard of 802.11bg. Best application at multi storey building and "Tether" app is required for configuration. (SIZE: 110x76x66mm / WEIGHT: 100 grams)
node.content: It carries 2 internal antennas that can boost the WiFi signals in 2.4 GHz frequency / Advance signal indicator from which one can adjust the range and check the number of devices activated through extender / Wifi extender can never be Wifi Router, therefore ethernet port is given to WiFi extender which is catching the signals from WiFi router to connect the single device through LAN / 802.11ac and 802.11bg are two different type of wireless technical specification while 802.11ac type of wireless device can detect the 5.1GHz of signals and 802.11bg wireless device can only detect the 2.4GHz signals even if the router is of dual bandwidth / This extender can boost the WiFi range in vertical direction and that’s why it is mostly used in multi storey building / 85% is the minimum signal strength which this extender can boost.
node.alt: TP-Link TL WA850RE N300 Wireless Range Extender Broadband WiFi Extender Wi-Fi Booster Hotspot with 1 Ethernet Port Plug and Play Built in Access Point Mode

node.name: Wireless Booster MAKE: NETGEAR MODEL: EX6110
node.description: One of the strongest boosters that can connect up to 6 devices and cover area of 1200 SqFeet. With 802.11bg wireless standard it can only detect 2.4 GHz signal and with LED lights display user can find the best location for range extender. (SIZE: 75x75x65mm / WEIGHT: 150 grams)
node.content: Compact design but target area up to 1200 SqFeet make it one of the strongest booster at current market / Can connect and deliver faster internet for 6 devices at average boosting speed sufficient for streaming HD video / 802.11ac and 802.11bg are two different type of wireless technical specification while 802.11ac type of wireless device can detect the 5.1GHz of signals and 802.11bg wireless device can only detect the 2.4GHz signals even if the router is of dual bandwidth / This extender can boost the WiFi range in both direction and that’s why it is mostly used in open WiFi cafe's / 85% is the minimum signal strength which this extender can boost.
node.alt: Netgear EX6110 AC1200 WiFi Range Extender White

node.name: Wireless Booster MAKE: MERCUSYS MODEL: MW300RE
node.description: 3 external antennas with MIMO technology help to boost the WiFi signals. With 802.11bg wireless standard it can only detect 2.4 GHz signal and with LED lights display user can monitor the network strength. Suitable for horizontal range coverage. (SIZE: 100x75x40mm / WEIGHT: 110 grams)
node.content: Extender or booster or Repeaters, all are same just its upon  manufacturer what he or she using / Comprise MIMO technology that boost the incoming WiFi signals up to double of its strength which means if incoming signal is of strength which delivering downloading speed 20Mbps than this booster will enhance it to 40Mbps / 802.11ac and 802.11bg are two different type of wireless technical specification while 802.11ac type of wireless device can detect the 5.1GHz of signals and 802.11bg wireless device can only detect the 2.4GHz signals even if the router is of dual bandwidth / LED lights display the strength of signal in rate at which the primary signal has been boosted / Small size did not put any physical load on electrical switch at which it get connected / Best perform at horizontal range of distribution and multi storey WiFi range enhancing is mostly prohibited with this booster.
node.alt: Mercusys MW300RE Wireless Repeater WiFi Booster MIMO Technology Three External Antennas  300Mbps Speed Wi-Fi Range Extender

node.name: Wireless Booster MAKE: TP-LINK MODEL: TL-RE200
node.description: 3 internal antennas which can boost the existing signal strength into twice the area. Advance wireless type which is 802.11ac that means it can catch 5.1 GHz frequency. Include one ethernet port to function as a wireless adapter. Ability to boost the signals in both directions. (SIZE: 100x76x66mm / WEIGHT: 110 grams)
node.content: With 3 internal antennas it can catch the weakest signal and boost it to twice the area in both direction / Most advance wireless type 802.11ac is installed in hardware that can catch the 5.1 GHz frequency signals generated by dual bandwidth router / Wifi extender can never be Wifi Router, therefore ethernet port is given to WiFi extender which is catching the signals from WiFi router to connect the single device through LAN / 95% is the minimum signal strength which this extender can boost / Small size did not put any physical load on electrical switch at which it get connected / Support like OneMesh function to boost signal strength while maintaining a single WiFi network that covers every corner of home which means no more searching around for a stronger signal for faster connection.
node.alt: TP Link AC750 Wifi Range Extender  Up to 750Mbps  Dual Band WiFi Extender Repeater Wifi Signal Booster Access Point Easy SetUp  Extends Wifi to Smart Home & Alexa Devices RE200

Include one ethernet port to function as a wireless adapter. Ability to boost the signals in both directions. (SIZE: 100x76x66mm / WEIGHT: 110 grams)
